flethelp.description: Very funny -_- !flethelp: List available Fletbot commands | !flethelp <command>: Get a description for the specified Fletbot command | Example: "!flethelp !fletpet"

fletsetroles.description: !fletsetroles <command> <list of roles>: Set the list of roles that can use specified command. Valid roles are broadcaster, moderator, vip, subscriber, all, default | Example: "!fletsetroles !fletclip vip moderator"

fletgetroles.description: !fletgetroles <command>: Get the list of roles that can use the specified command | Example: "!fletgetroles !fso"

fcooldown.description: !fcooldown <command> <cooldown seconds>: When cooldown time is not provided, returns the current cooldown setting for a specified command. When cooldown time is provided, sets cooldown time (in seconds) for given command. | Example: "!fcooldown !sip" OR "!fcooldown !sip 5"

fletage.description: !fletage <hours> <timeout | ban>: Set the minimum required account age (in hours) for users in chat. Accounts below the threshold are timed out or banned depending on the specified flag. Defaults to timeout when flag is omitted. | Example: "!fletage 24 ban"

otd.description: Part of every pro streamer's balanced diet | Example: "!otd"

fletso.description: !fletso <active | inactive> <fso>: Enable/disable automatic shoutouts when being raided. If optional 'fso' flag is provided, '!fso' shoutout is used instead of channel's '!so' shoutout | Example: "!fletso active fso"

sipprofile.description: !sipprofile <action> <profile name>: Create, list, or delete profiles that can be used to track multiple sip counters simultaneously. Possible action parameters are: <set | list | delete | sip | setsips | getsips> | Example: "!sipprofile set halo"

setsips.description: !setsips <number>: Set sip count to specified number | Example: "!setsips 50"

fletscrew.description: !fletscrew <off | normal | max>: Set anti-pyramid mode. 'off' flag disables pyramid countermeasures. 'normal' flag sets Fletbot to interrupt pyramids. 'max' flag will set Fletbot to time out pyramid makers | Example: "!fletscrew max"

fletpfp.description: !fletpfp <username>: Get a user's profile picture | Example: "!fletpfp @fletbot795"

fletmote.description: !fletmote <channel name> <emote code>: Get a channel's SUB emote as an image | Example: "!fletmote hannahsulu hannah38Sip"

fletclip.description: !fletclip <channel name> <clip name>: Search given channel for a clip whose title most closely resembles the provided clip name. Setting clip name to * will return a random clip from the channel's top 100 clips | Example: "!fletclip @ti8ick called out"

fletyt.description: !fletyt <query>: Search YouTube for a video using the provided query | Example: "!fletyt Boston Dynamics"

fletalytics.description: !fletalytics: View stats and analytics on command usage and pyramid screwing | Example: "!fletalytics"

changelog: Updates to data backup functionality to stop Fletbot from being irresponsible and slacking on the job
